description: Allowlist for orphaned files audit - files that should never be deleted even if they appear unused

notes.types/api/generated/openapi.d.ts: AUTO-GENERATED - Do not delete. Regenerated via pnpm openapi:gen
notes.types/shared/index.ts: Intentional convenience facade for cross-cutting primitives
notes.types/api/index.ts: Intentional barrel for OpenAPI types (stable import path)
notes.components/dashboard/entities/shared/ren: Used indirectly by AG Grid column definitions
notes.config/domain-map.ts: Architecture config consumed by dependency-cruiser (not imported via TS)
notes.types/config/security/types.ts: Type augmentation/module declaration (referenced via tsconfig path mapping)
notes.lib/auth/authorization/roles.ts: assertRole function used in tests and test setup
notes.lib/auth/server.ts: requireUserId function used in tests (deprecated but still referenced)
notes.lib/integrations/clickhouse/security.ts: mapClickhouseError used via require() in query-utils.ts
notes.lib/integrations/env/index.ts: getEnv functions used extensively throughout codebase
notes.lib/security/index.ts: maskSensitiveData exported and used in multiple files
notes.lib/server/db/index.ts: getTenantScopedSupabaseClient used in API routes and tests
notes.lib/services/index.ts: Entity column configs (ADDRESSES_COLUMNS, etc.) used in tests and components
